name: Onchain Trade
description: What is the project about? Onchain Trade(OT) is a vertically integrated DeFi protocol where people can provide liquidity, swap, borrow and trading perpetuals with 0 slippage. OT designed single side AMM pools so that liquidity can be used for swap as well as borrow, allowing LPs to earn both swap fees and borrow interest, which increases capital efficiency and decreases Impermanent Loss for LPs. What makes your project unique? First perps dex on zkSync Era, unique Single Side Liquidity design, combination of swap and borrow to increase capital efficiency&APR for LPs. History of your project. Started building from early 2022, launched on zkSync Era mainnet on March, 2023 with swap, borrow and liquidity provision enabled. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Launch onchain perpetuals trading on zkSync Era What can your token be used for? Stake to earn revenue distribution, voting.
